trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Toledo
There were no other sightings in Toledo on or around January 10th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsthis is not a ufo sighting my event was a full contact with a alien where i was told all the answers to all the questions i asked and some answers told to me that i did not ask so lets begin well i was laying on my couch back in january and i heard a noise at my back sliding glass door and i heard what sounded like metal tapping at my glass door tink tink tink so i started to listen more carefully there it was again so i got my pistol and before i got off the couch something told me i wont need the weapon and something was telling me to not be frightened at what i see out there so i go to the curtain that is over the door and peeked out a little what i saw was so scary to me and im a big dude and dont scare easily it looked like a small human like being with eyes that shined like the eyes of an alligator when u shine a light at them but could not see completely beceause its dark out back no light at all so something said open the door so i did and i got back and here comes in this almost humanlike being i was in complete frozen shock to what im seeing it was like a hairless human with no ears but little holes on the side of head and a very small nose like a newborn baby nose a slit for a mouth no lips no teeth no tounge all i keep hearing in my head was dont be afraid and dont try to hurt me and it held out its hand and it had what i would call a high tech personel organizer so i took it out of its hand which looked like long thin muscleless arms wich were as long as mine but on a being half as tall as me the second i took the device it was talking to me in english and said this is how were going to communicate cause the mind talk will kill all my brain cells very fast so i said what do u want with me it said scientific reasearch i said what kind of reasearch and why me go to some 3rd world country and do it there it said they have been monitoring me since i was born i said bullshit and images popped in my mind of when i had sleep peralisis when i was like 5 or 6 and i swore it was a dream it wasnt and the time i thought i fell out of a tree but it was them putting me back on the ground a little rough i said why u monitoring me it said i had the blood of the kings in me i said what does that mean it said humans are there creation we are there hybreeds there dna and the dna from the symians from long ago and the dna of other beings also and my blood sends off a signal to them due to the purity of my dna from there elders at this point im thinking im loseing my mind this has to be a brain problem like scitzophrenia or something it said im fine so i went with it and said well i have many questions for u it said it will answer all that it can i said ok where u from it said not your solar system or galaxy but a galaxy 1 million light years away from a planet that resembled earth with less gravity and more sun how do you get here from that far away it said there vehicles bend spacetime but could not say how beceause it said im not intelligent enough to grasp the technology it said dont be ashamed of that his people were 1 billion years ahead of us technalogicly i said ok then asked why cant u talk it said it could but its voicebox cant make words like ours it made some sounds that resembled very squeaky brakes on a car and it said his people communicate through the mind which is accomplished through a chemical and electrical reaction in the brain that we dont produce then it said it had questions for me we will go back and forth asking it asked me if it could touch me i said where you want to touch me at it said all over i was hesitant but agreed only if i could touch it also it agreed so it started to rub my leg feeling the hair almost like massageing the muscles it felt weird its hands and fingers resembled that of a lizard kinda it felt my body all over and then i got my turn to touch it its skin was like rubber almost shiny and smooth and smooshy then we went back to q and a i said how old are you it said 500 earth years and his people live as long as 5000 sometimes i asked are you a boy or a girl it said it was a male of its species and i said where are your private parts he said they were not like ours but in a similar area as mine and his come out only when its gonna mate with a female of his species i said why do u resemble a human he said all life evolves to an upright creature so there is less exposure to the sun an have more than one limb and sensory argans in case of a loss or failure to one of your parts well thats all of my encounter im going to tell for now i was thinking about writing a book and getting paid for it or something
